summary: A penniless socialite is hired by two young men as a front in their plan to start a magazine. Soon, however, they find themselves more interested in her than in their publishing venture.
cast: Claudette Colbert|Fred MacMurray|Robert Young|William Collier Sr.|Donald Meek|Richard Carle|Edgar Kennedy|Johnny Arthur|Kate MacKenna|Jimmy Conlin|Edward Gargan|William Arnold|Brooks Benedict|A.S. 'Pop' Byron|Eddie Dunn|Tom Hanlon|Tom Kennedy|Jerry Mandy|Robert McKenzie|Esther Michelson|Alexander Pollard|Cyril Ring|C.L. Sherwood|Charles Sylber|Charles West
title: La novia que vuelve
